ourvideopoker

Class OurVideoPoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ourvideopoker.OurVideoPoker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Videopoker
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OurVideoPokerFile

    public class OurVideoPoker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Videopoker
    This Class is our implementation of a videopoker machine, it implements the Videopooker interface
    Author:
    Alexandre, Rui , Pedro
    See Also:
    Videopooker

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int credits
      This field represents the credits that the player have in the Videopooker machine
      (package private) HandCards game_cards
      This filed represents the cards that he machine have , for that it uses a object of type HandCards
      (package private) Deck game_deck
      This field is the Deck of the videopoker machine.
      (package private) Statistics game_stats
      For save the machine Statistics we use a object of type Statistics to handl the hands that had been given in the past
      (package private) int gamestate
      To implement the game we use a simple StateMachine, this field is the state of the game at each time 0 - begin 1 - after first bet 2 - after deal 3 - after the hold - and end of play 4 - after the bet but not the first bet
      (package private) int lastbet
      This filed represents the last bet placed by the player in the machine
      (package private) VideoPokerVariation variation
      Must important thing it uses a object that implements the VideoPokerVariation Interface, is with that object that the machine knows what variation of videopoker is being played

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OurVideoPoker(int credits, VideoPokerVariation variation)
      Constructor of the Videopoker, it receives the initial credits that a player put in the machine and a object with the variation that is to be played

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AdviceResult advice()
      Method that implements the move for advice, if the advice is valid returns a AdviceResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
      BetResult bet()
      Method that implements the move for bet with no arg, so it places a bet with the last valid bet that had occurred.If the bet is valid returns a BetResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
      BetResult bet(int credits)
      Method that implements the move for bet , it receives the credits that the player want to bet and if the bet is valid returns a BetResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
      CreditResult credit()
      Method that implements the credit command
      DealResult deal()
      Method that implements the move for deal , if the deal is valid returns a DealResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
      HoldResult hold(boolean[] to_hold)
      Method that implements the move for hold , it receives a boolean array of size 5 whit true in the index's with the cards that the player want to hold and false in the ones that the player want to discard if the hold is valid returns a HoldResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void quit()
      Method that implements the quit command it returns nothing but if the command is invalid throws an InvalidPlayException
      StatisticsResult statistics()
      Method that implements the statistics command

    • Field Detail

      • credits

        int credits
        This field represents the credits that the player have in the Videopooker machine

      • gamestate

        int gamestate
        To implement the game we use a simple StateMachine, this field is the state of the game at each time 0 - begin 1 - after first bet 2 - after deal 3 - after the hold - and end of play 4 - after the bet but not the first bet

      • lastbet

        int lastbet
        This filed represents the last bet placed by the player in the machine

      • game_deck

        Deck game_deck
        This field is the Deck of the videopoker machine.
        See Also:
        Deck

        HandCards game_cards
        This filed represents the cards that he machine have , for that it uses a object of type HandCards
        See Also:
        HandCards

      • game_stats

        Statistics game_stats
        For save the machine Statistics we use a object of type Statistics to handl the hands that had been given in the past
        See Also:
        Statistics

      • variation

        final VideoPokerVariation variation
        Must important thing it uses a object that implements the VideoPokerVariation Interface, is with that object that the machine knows what variation of videopoker is being played
        See Also:
        VideoPokerVariation

    • Constructor Detail

      • OurVideoPoker

        public OurVideoPoker(int credits,
                     VideoPokerVariation variation)
        Constructor of the Videopoker, it receives the initial credits that a player put in the machine and a object with the variation that is to be played
        Parameters:
        credits - the initial credits in the machine
        variation - the VideoPokerVariation that is going to be played in the machine
        See Also:
        VideoPokerVariation

    • Method Detail

      • bet

        public BetResult bet(int credits)
              throws InvalidPlayException
        Method that implements the move for bet , it receives the credits that the player want to bet and if the bet is valid returns a BetResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
        Specified by:
        bet in interface Videopoker
        Parameters:
        credits - - credits that the player want to bet between [1-5]
        Returns:
        BetResult - object with information of the bet playmove
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - in case of error the bet is not placed and this method throws a InvalidPlayException with a message string that can be as it follows:

        - if the bet is not in the range [1 - 5] : 'b: illegal command, please make a bet in the range [1,5]'

        - if the player dont have credits : 'b: illegal command, player without credits'

        - if the player dont have credtis for that bet : 'b: illegal command, player without credits for that bet'

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 0 and 3) : 'b: illegal command'

        See Also:
        BetResult

      • bet

        public BetResult bet()
              throws InvalidPlayException
        Method that implements the move for bet with no arg, so it places a bet with the last valid bet that had occurred.If the bet is valid returns a BetResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
        Specified by:
        bet in interface Videopoker
        Returns:
        BetResult - object with information of the bet playmove
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - in case of error the bet is not placed and this method throws a InvalidPlayException with a message string that can be as it follows:

        - if the bet is not in the range [1 - 5] : 'b: illegal command, please make a bet in the range [1,5]'

        - if the player dont have credits : 'b: illegal command, player without credits'

        - if the player dont have credtis for that bet : 'b: illegal command, player without credits for that bet'

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 0 and 3) : 'b: illegal command'

        See Also:
        BetResult

      • deal

        public DealResult deal()
                throws InvalidPlayException
        Method that implements the move for deal , if the deal is valid returns a DealResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
        Specified by:
        deal in interface Videopoker
        Returns:
        DealResult - object with information of the deal playmove
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - in case of error this method throws a InvalidPlayException with a message string that can be as it follows:

        - if the player dont have credits : 'd: illegal command, player without credits'

        - if the player dont have credtis for that bet : 'd: illegal command, player without credits for that bet'

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 1,3 and 4) : 'd: illegal command'

        See Also:
        DealResult

      • hold

        public HoldResult hold(boolean[] to_hold)
                throws InvalidPlayException
        Method that implements the move for hold , it receives a boolean array of size 5 whit true in the index's with the cards that the player want to hold and false in the ones that the player want to discard if the hold is valid returns a HoldResult otherwise throw a exception with a message of the error occurred
        Specified by:
        hold in interface Videopoker
        Parameters:
        to_hold - - boolean array of size 5
        Returns:
        HoldResult - object with information of the hold playmove
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - in case of error the hold is not placed and this method throws a InvalidPlayException with a message string that can be as it follows:

        - if the array is not of size 5: 'ERROR: ARRAY OF HOLD DONT HAVE 5 FIELDS'

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 2) : 'h: illegal command'

        - if the deck had finished: 'ERRO: END OF DECK'

        See Also:
        EndOfDeck, HoldResult

      • credit

        public CreditResult credit()
        Method that implements the credit command
        Specified by:
        credit in interface Videopoker
        Returns:
        it returns a CreditResult object with the information of the credits in the machine

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 2) : 'a: illegal command'

        See Also:

      • quit

        public void quit()
          throws InvalidPlayException
        Method that implements the quit command it returns nothing but if the command is invalid throws an InvalidPlayException
        Specified by:
        quit in interface Videopoker
        Throws:
        InvalidPlayException - in case of error this method throws a InvalidPlayException with a message string that can be as it follows:

        - if the gamestate don't permit that play (gamestate diferent from 3 and 0) : 'q: illegal command'
